alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 04 at 7:43PM MDT until April 04 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 230, 233, AND 237... A strong cold front was continuing to push slowly south across far southeast colorado and is expected to reach the New Mexico border around 9 pm. Additionally, winds over far southern Colorado have decreased somewhat, and humidity values were above 15 percent nearly all areas over far southern Colorado. With the front continuing to progress south, and humidity values increasing, the Red Flag Warning will be allowed to expire at 8 pm this evening.
